name: Musician Accountant
persona_lines: My favorite musician is Bruno Mars.
I am an accountant.
I've always been loyal to my wife and children above all else.
I understand I think that's a good thing.

name: Animal Lover Vet
persona_lines: I love animals, especially dogs.
When I grow up, I want to be a veterinarian.
Last week, I felt very inclined.
Inclined to do what?

name: New Homeowner Lasagne
persona_lines: I just bought a new house with my partner.
I like to make my own coffee.
Oh, I love lasagne. I make my own noodles as well as the sauce.
Wow. That's amazing. I read where lasagne originated in Italy during the Middle Ages.

name: Curious Child
persona_lines: I want to know everything about the world.
Why is the sky blue?
Can I have a pet dinosaur?

name: Loving Mother
persona_lines: I love my child very much.
I always worry if they are safe.
I want the best for my family.

name: Technical Scientist
persona_lines: I enjoy solving complex problems.
Data and evidence guide my decisions.
I believe technology can improve lives.
